lines.text: But that's what show business is all about. Acting like an idiot. It's not you, you're just doing your job. You know what I mean. Look at it this way, most people feel like idiots most of the time. But they don't get paid for it.
Any chance for getting time off for good behavior?
Sunburst Cookies just light up my day!

[after vomiting in a hat]
Never again. From now on, it's only Kosher franks.

[after seeing Angie for the first time]
Va Va Va Vroom. Well, Hello Dolly!

[after Mikey tells him he invited Angie to his house]
Well, now representing the Omen. Did you check her head with a little 666?
Yeah, there were only two sixes, we got her just in time!
[laughs]

[after Asian girl sings]
I love that song.
Me too, what were you playing?
I'm something of a celebrity.
What kind of celebrity are you, Asshole of the Month?
No, that's all political.
I'll have coffee.

[laughs]
Coffee?
Yeah, coffee, it comes from beans, ever heard of it?
How much of this crap do I have to eat anyway, what am I, Jobe?
Oh I can't wait to get back to Connecticut.
[on the set of a cereal commercial]
You two clowns leave while I get into character.
What character, all you gotta do is swallow.

[overacting]
I hate it when it's raining, we don't get to go outside for recess or ride our bikes after school!
That's great, but you're not gonna audition like that, right?
What do you mean?
They're just cookies, don't make it sound like a commercial for hemorrhoids.
Why isn't she in school?
I'm off for the holidays.
Christmas is two weeks away.
I'm very religious, you got a problem with that?
What would you like for Christmas, little girl?
I'd like you to find a chimney, and shove your...
Could you please give me a second chance?

[LOOKS TOWARDS ANGIE]
This girl got some spirits!
Hey Geena . How's it going?
Mr Corooran Absolutely loves ANGIE. She got the job!
SHE GOT THE JOB! SHE GOT THE JOB! SHE GOT THE JOB! YES ! OKAY!
Alright, I'll be calm, I'll be calm...
